## Bio

Sita Lujintanon is an epidemiologist by training and an experienced implementation researcher who works to improve equity in HIV care engagement in Thailand where she is from and globally. She has a growing interest in overcoming missing data the in the real world to improve HIV cascade outcome assessment. During her down time, Sita enjoys windsurfing, scuba diving, and hanging out with her dog, Sam .
